statements: DELETE FROM wildlife_sightings WHERE location = 'Rainforest' AND sighting_date = '2022-06-15';
DELETE FROM wildlife_sightings WHERE id = 5 AND species = 'Tiger';
DELETE FROM wildlife_sightings WHERE sighting_date = '2022-08-15' AND location = 'Amazon Rainforest';
DELETE FROM Conservation_Efforts WHERE conservation_category = 'Endangered' AND conservation_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM conservation_efforts WHERE location = 'Amazon Rainforest';
DELETE FROM conservation_efforts WHERE location = 'Amazon Rainforest' AND action = 'Habitat Restoration';
DELETE FROM research WHERE research_topic = 'Marine Life';
